name: Fight This
description:
Fight This is a battle-packed game where you're to fight off hungry monsters and survive. Shoot hordes of enemies non-stop, try all the fighting techniques and show dexterity, evading the objects flying at you. Earn points and upgrade your features.

ENDLESS FIGHT
Dozens of bloodthirsty enemies seek to kill you, but you will not surrender without a fight. Show that they're messing up with the wrong guy!

ADDITIONAL TASKS
Complete additional tasks to earn more points.

SET RECORDS
Try to survive this madness as long as possible.
